TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-taysimaw, title = nipaluma-taysimaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-taysimaw} }

S.FORM: == taysimaw == u siwkay nu nipaluma pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u cudad a ngangan: u sapamat a ngangan: u Amilika a ngangan: u zuma a cidekay a kamu Pangcha: x Tayan: x Sejek: x Paywan: x Taluku: x Yuwatan: madain lisav tu kusungai-ia Rukay: x Cou: cuun vu'ung Kabalan: x Kanakanabu: x Laaluwa: x Saysia: x Puyuma: x Saw: x Tau: x u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam 大葉仙茅 tayeixianmaw u sulit nu Lipun u sulit nu Amilika saungay misapayu' a cidekay Yuwatan, Sakizaya, Pangcah

== taysimaw == o siwkay no nipaloma pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o codad a ngangan: o sapamat a ngangan: o Amilika a ngangan: o zoma a cidekay a kamo Pangcha: x Tayan: x Sejek: x Paywan: x Taloko: x Yowatan: madain lisav to kosongai-ia Rokay: x Coo: coon vo'ong Kabalan: x Kanakanabo: x Laalowa: x Saysia: x Poyoma: x Saw: x Tao: x o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam 大葉仙茅 tayeixianmaw o solit no Lipon o solit no Amilika saongay misapayo' a cidekay Yowatan, Sakizaya, Pangcah
